expo.name: Mesan React Native Authentication And CRUD
expo.description:
A React Native app using React Hooks and React Context API with:

Authentication: 
Register
Login
Username
Forgot Password 
Update Profile 

CRUD operations:
View All Events
Create a New Event
Update and Delete any Event created by the user
Filter Events by Categories and Dates (Today, Tomorrow, This Week, This Weekend)
Search for Events
